c:Value.d:Desc: Recruits compete for their postings as well as their gear.
Yanme’e physiology is well suited for the role of infiltrator.
More experience and gear doesn't always connote good morale.
Recruits are often posted as security or "movable shields".
A sentient labor-saving device with the ability to self-repair and self-replicate. Good with computers.
Killing your friends is socially unacceptable.
These Special Police Units are feared by all factions.
Trained as pilots and heavy weapons specialists; still jumpy.
Hunters are deployed more as weapons platforms than troops.
Only battle-hardened veterans are chosen to become snipers.
To be effective, officers need to inspire fear and respect.
Drones aren’t brave; they’re just incapable of feeling fear.
Commanding troops requires both audacity and great strength.
Surrender is not an option.
Killed, once again, by the guardians.
Primarily Brute-crewed reconnaissance and fast attack vehicle.
Primary reconnaissance vehicle of the Covenant forces.
Small, fast and maneuverable; often used by anti-armor teams.
The name Shade is applied generically to all Covenant stationary anti-infantry guns.
It's a little like a birdhouse for Huragok. A great big exploding birdhouse.
Primary ground support aircraft of the Covenant forces.
The most common reconnaissance vehicle in the UNSC’s arsenal.
Heavily armed and armored troop transport VOTL craft.
The M808B is the most common main battle tank in service with the UNSC.
A Wraith is the backbone of any Covenant assault force.
Ultimate assault engine of the Covenant ground forces.
Kill 10 opponents in a row without dying.
Kill 20 opponents in a row without dying.
Kill 30 opponents in a row without dying.
Kill 40 opponents in a row without dying.
Kill 50 opponents in a row without dying.
Kill 100 opponents in a row without dying.
Kill 5 opponents in a row with the shotgun without dying.
Kill 10 opponents in a row with the shotgun without dying.
Kill 5 opponents in a row with a sniper weapon without dying.
Kill 10 opponents in a row with a sniper weapon without dying.
Splatter 5 opponents in a row using a vehicle without dying.
Splatter 10 opponents in a row using a vehicle without dying.
Kill 5 opponents in a row with a Gravity Hammer without dying.
Kill 10 opponents in a row with the Gravity Hammer without dying.
Kill 5 opponents in a row with grenade sticks without dying.
Kill 10 opponents in a row with grenade sticks without dying.
Kill 2 opponents in the blink of an eye.
Get a 3rd kill moments after your 2nd.
Get a 4th kill moments after your 3rd.
Get a 5th kill moments after your 4th.
Get a 6th kill moments after your 5th.
Get a 7th kill moments after your 6th.
Get a 8th kill moments after your 7th.
Get a 9th kill moments after your 8th.
Get a 10th kill moments after your 9th.
Hit and kill an opponent with a melee attack.
Hit and kill an opponent with a melee attack from behind.
Kill an opponent by sticking them with a plasma or brute grenade.
Kill an enemy with a headshot.
Kill an enemy by using the Spartan Laser.
Hit and kill an opponent with your vehicle.
Score a kill by filling an opponent with enough needles to cause a detonation.
Kill an enemy with an EMP.
Kill an opponent with a flame-based weapon.
Kill an opponent after you have died.
Board a vehicle by removing and then quickly killing its driver.
Assist a teammate in killing the enemy.
Complete a wave as the last man standing.
Vision kill.
Respawning is disabled. Be careful!
Melee to recharge your Stamina.
Enemies always evade danger.
Enemies love to throw grenades.
Weapons drop low-ammo weapons.
Enemies are upgraded.
Enemy shields deflect bullets.
Enemies have 2x health.
No first person HUD.
Physics impulses increased.
Grunt headshots cause confetti.
Rare dialog is frequent and vice versa.
Gas operated, fully-automatic projectile rifle capable of sustained continuous fire. Accurate if used in short, well aimed bursts and otherwise ferociously powerful at close range.
Primary ground support aircraft of the Covenant forces.
The UNSC’s accurate semi-automatic medium range rifle, fires three rounds per squeeze of the trigger.
A hand carried Covenant particle beam weapon, with an adjustable 5x / 10x scope.
WUH-BLAM!
Fires explosive projectiles and is furnished with an elaborate and dangerous bayonet.
An unusual Covenant projectile weapon, firing shielded radioactive rounds.
Primarily Brute crewed reconnaissance and fast attack vehicle.
I'm calling my lawyer!
Holds 5 shells per magazine, this massive handgun is favored by Brutes and is based on their native, pre-Covenant technology.
WUH-BLAM!
Iiiiiiiieeeeeeeee!!!
The type-3 antipersonnel, anti-material incendiary grenade is used to destroy material and inflict grievous injuries upon personnel.
A shoulder fired Covenant projectile weapon, it is commonly employed in both anti-personnel and anti-vehicle roles.
Standard issue UNSC fragmentation grenade.
Armed with twin rapid fire plasma cannons, this is a typical Covenant ground assault and recon vehicle.
Favored by Brutes, this weapon is as much a symbol of leadership as it is a weapon.
The AV-14s provide close-in fire support and point target attacks against enemy armor.
Standard issue UNSC turret-mounted heavy machinegun. It is extremely heavy, as one might expect, and slow to spin up to full firing rate.
An accurized version of the standard UNSC sidearm with integrated sound suppressor and black polymer finish. Issued with VnSLS/V 6E smart-linked scope.
Somebody smashed somebody!
Although technically designed for vehicle or stationary use, the LAU-65D can be detached from its base to be used as a mobile support weapon.
This is purely a transport vehicle, and while fast and maneuverable, it possesses no defensive or offensive capabilities whatsoever.
Razor sharp crystalline projectiles with a combined explosive property, are fired from this elaborate Covenant weapon.
The type-42 DESW has become a much more common sight on the battlefield since the Brutes have come to prominence within the Covenant.
Highly explosive Covenant grenade with a dangerous adherence property.
Fires directed energy bolts with a shield-depleting Overcharge function.
A common, light plasma weapon favored by Covenant forces.
The type-42 DESW has become a much more common sight on the battlefield since the Brutes have come to prominence within the Covenant.
A simple proximity mine that reacts to pressure or movement.
The accurate, destructive heavy ordnance weapon of the UNSC arsenal.
Remember this maxim - Speed is life, never provide the enemy with a stationary target.
The M247T 7.62mm medium machine gun
Covenant ground forces often employ stationary energy weapon turrets to strengthen defensive positions.
The UNSC’s resident close-quarters assault weapon.
A favorite of the ODSTs, this variant of the M7/C is issued with a the SS/M 49 sound suppressor and SLS/V 5B smart-linked scope.
The primary sniper rifle system used by UNSC forces.
A directed energy weapon. It’s slow, but one of the most powerful portable armaments in the UNSC arsenal.
A primitive and deadly explosive device that impales any target and holds tight until it explodes in a shredding hail of razor sharp metal.
Holding 48 spikes per magazine, this vicious and dangerous rifle is favored by Brutes and based on their native, pre-Covenant technology.
The M808B Main Battle Tank is the primary armored fighting vehicle in UNSC service.
Killed, once again, by the guardians.
Hey, buddy, that's a felony.
The ubiquitous Warthog - three thousand kilos of fuel-injected ballistic polycarbonate, titanium, and carbon nanotube.

The M41 light anti-aircraft gun is an externally powered, three-barreled, rotary-fire machine gun. Though inaccurate at long ranges, it has excellent penetration characteristics and a high rate of fire.
The Wraith assault gun carriage is the primary armored fighting vehicle used by the Covenant. It is bulbous and thickly armored, but surprisingly maneuverable.
All post-2549 model Wraiths have an extended crew area with a Type-52 DESW in a ring mount.
The M7057 is a standard chemical flamethrower, which projects and ignites a stream of volatile, semi-liquid fuel.

The M41 light anti-aircraft gun is an externally powered, three-barreled, rotary-fire machine gun. Though inaccurate at long ranges, it has excellent penetration characteristics and a high rate of fire.
The gauss cannon is an excellent anti-vehicle weapon but it is not very effective against massed infantry.
